title: Pharmacological treatment of gastro‚Äêoesophageal reflux in children
authors: Tighe, MP; Andrews, E; Liddicoat, I; Afzal, NA; Hayen, A; Beattie, RM

response.output: Pharmacological treatment of gastro-oesophageal reflux in children shows that omeprazole may or may not provide symptomatic benefit for infants, and proton pump inhibitors at various doses provide little to no symptomatic and endoscopic benefit for children; further studies are needed to determine effectiveness.
